law.text:
The panel shall:
Render advisory opinions to the cabinet on the effectiveness of the Small Business Stationary Source Technical and Environmental Compliance Assistance Program.
Prepare periodic reports to the United States Environmental Protection Agency on the program's compliance with the Federal Paperwork Reduction, Regulatory Flexibility, and Equal Access to Justice Acts.
Review information for small businesses subject to the 1990 Federal Clean Air Act amendments to assure the information is understandable to the layperson.
Disseminate reports, reviews, and advisory opinions.
law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 245, sec. 4, effective July 14, 1992.
